item.description:
The summer season of 3rd Thursday Street Festivals is beginning in Willimantic this Thursday! All details can be found here http://www.willimanticstreetfest.com/ :) Even if this one has rain, there will be others according to the schedule.

We could meet in front of Cafemantic or anywhere else people would suggest -- I haven't been to one of these before, so I am not sure where parking would be, except down by the old cinema.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Street Festival in Willimantic
